title: Blinded by the Sun
description: Ciro is like the sun; if you stare too hard, you become blind.But what happens when you stare, and the sun looks back at you?He is the sun personified. I crave to stare at him, bask in all his glory and disappear in him. He makes me see what I didn’t want to see. He makes me strong. He makes me whole.He makes me…Me but I don’t want to be me, I want to be Ciro’s.--Blinded By The SunDisclaimer: This book is a Dark Romance Read. It contains triggers, violence and other acts that may bother others. Please be warned and advised before picking up the book. There is also course language used in this book. Thank you.
author: King Ellie
